articles.description: Google Search with quotes will now show a tiny snippet underneath the search result link displaying the exact term they are looking for.
articles.content: Google Search with quotes is one of the lesser-known yet useful hacks that one can use. It allows users to look for the exact word or phrase on the internet. Now, Google has made it even better by no… [+1979 chars]

articles.title: Realme C30 to go on sale today at 12pm: Price, offers and other details | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Realme C30 is a budget category phone that comes powered by a Unisoc T612 processor and runs on Realme UI Go Edition. It will go on sale via Flipkart at 12pm today.
articles.content: Realme C30 is set to go on sale today. The smartphone will be available on Flipkart at 12pm. The handset is an entry-level phone which comes with a starting price of 6,749. As part of the sale, buyer… [+2065 chars]
